mapper.select: SELECT admin_id as adminId, admin_nm as adminNm, admin_priv_cd as adminPrivCd, email_addr as emailAddr, password as password FROM conadminm WHERE admin_id = #{username}
SELECT admin_id as adminId, admin_nm as adminNm, admin_priv_cd as adminPrivCd, email_addr as emailAddr, password as password FROM conadminm order by udt_date desc

SELECT COUNT(1) OVER() AS totalCount, admin_id as adminId, admin_nm as adminNm, admin_priv_cd as adminPrivCd, email_addr as emailAddr, password as password, to_char(ad_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as adDate FROM conadminm order by udt_date desc LIMIT #{rowPerPage} OFFSET #{skipCount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO con.conadminm ( admin_id, admin_nm, admin_priv_cd, email_addr, password, crt_id, crt_ip, ad_date, udt_id, udt_ip, udt_date) VALUES (#{adminId}, #{adminNm}, #{adminPrivCd}, #{emailAddr}, #{password}, #{crtId}, #{crtIp}, current_timestamp, #{udtId}, #{udtIp}, current_timestamp)
